item.title: Political Economy and the Changing Global Order: World Order, Non-State Actors, and the Global Casino: The Retreat of the State?
item.description: Book Chapter: This is the an edited version of the text published as (1998g) with the addition of a new introduction which briefly lays out many of the arguments which Strange made her own over her long and distinguished career. Pages 82-90
